content:
We are looking at some use cases for using messaging in a local solution (A bit like the Da Vinci Alerts - but different payloads).

Has anyone thought how to manage versioning in the payloads - the only approach I can think of is that if you make a breaking change to a payload then you would need to use a new event code.

Are there any other approaches being used?
Just make sure to use 'open Profiles' and/or 'open GraphDefs' to minimize the chances of breaking changes...
